name: Square Route
description: Square Route is an classic puzzle game in which you modify the terrain by adding and removing platforms and placing tools to create a safe Route for the Squares to get to their targets. With 120 addictive levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
